lines.text:
[comming up from the food cellar, runs through the hallway while looking for Vanessa, whos reflection he suddenly discovers in the mirror]
Where have you been? Everyone has gone mad, they're all looking for you.
I was just outside, having some fresh air
The water tank in the cellar... I don't know what happened!
I think it's the heart of the house, pumping the water through the veins of the house.

[almost imperceptible shakes his head, walks up to the front door]
Henrik! Gia! I've found her!

[follows J.B with her eyes, taking no note of his statement, and whispers]
The ghosts of the dead lives in the tank
